data.fullContent: The great migration is an annual event. Millions of wildebeest and other animals travel from the Serengeti in Africa to the Mara in Kenya. The Serengeti is a grassland that comes to life in the summer when many of the animals are born. Then, in the winter, many of the animals leave to find greener grass. The Serengeti isn't a very good place for animals to live permanently. The rain there is scarce, so there's not enough feed for all the animals. A few months after they give birth, many of the mother animals who are still nursing leave. Then, after this group leaves, the father animals of the same species join and take the trip as a group. Once they arrive at the Mara, the food is much better. There are also more predators there, so they look out for each other more.

q1.translation: 大迁徙是一年一度的大事。数以百万计的角马和其他动物从非洲的塞伦盖蒂草原迁徙到肯尼亚的马拉。塞伦盖蒂草原是一片在夏天活跃起来的草原，许多动物在夏天出生。然后，在冬天，许多动物离开去寻找更绿的草地。塞伦盖蒂不是一个适合动物永久居住的好地方。那里雨水稀少，所以没有足够的食物给所有的动物。它们生产几个月后，许多母动物仍在哺乳。然后，在这群动物离开后，同一物种的动物父亲加入，作为一个团队进行旅行。
q1.front: The great migration is an annual event. Millions of wildebeest and other animals travel from the Serengeti in Africa to the Mara in Kenya. The Serengeti is a grassland that comes to life in the summer when many of the animals are born. Then, in the winter, many of the animals leave to find greener grass. The Serengeti isn't a very good place for animals to live permanently. The rain there is scarce, so there's not enough feed for all the animals. A few months after they give birth, many of the mother animals who are still nursing leave. Then, after this group leaves, the father animals of the same species join and take the trip as a group.
q1.content: The great migration is an annual event. Millions of wildebeest and ____ animals travel from the Serengeti in Africa to the Mara in Kenya. The Serengeti is a grassland that ____ to life in the summer when many of the animals are born. Then, in the winter, ____ of the animals leave to find greener grass. The Serengeti isn't a ____ good place for animals to live permanently. The rain there is scarce, so there's not enough feed ____ all the animals. A few months after they give birth, many of the mother animals who are still nursing ____. Then, after this group leaves, the father ____ of the same species join and take the trip ____ a group.

q2.translation: 大迁徙是一年一度的大事。数以百万计的角马和其他动物从非洲的塞伦盖蒂草原迁徙到肯尼亚的马拉。塞伦盖蒂草原是一片在夏天活跃起来的草原，许多动物在夏天出生。然后，在冬天，许多动物离开去寻找更绿的草地。塞伦盖蒂不是一个适合动物永久居住的好地方。那里雨水稀少，所以没有足够的食物给所有的动物。它们生产几个月后，许多母动物仍在哺乳。然后，在这群动物离开后，同一物种的动物父亲加入，作为一个团队进行旅行。他们一到玛拉，食物就好多了。那里也有更多的捕食者，所以它们更加互相照顾。
q2.front: The great migration is an annual event. Millions of wildebeest and other animals travel from the Serengeti in Africa to the Mara in Kenya. q2.ending: There are also more predators there, so they look out for each other more.

options.sentence: Once they arrive at the Mara, the food is much better.
The warm weather and plentiful food in North America attracted the rats.
The condors migrated north every year to find food and raise their young.
They can migrate more than 600 miles over a period of a month.

options.sentence: The great migration is an annual event where millions of wildebeest and other animals travel from the Serengeti to the Mara in Kenya.
The bison travel thousands of miles across the Great Plains of North America, usually in small herds of no more than 50 animals.
The migration of birds is a very important event for scientists because it helps them to understand how migratory patterns work.
The Great Migration began in the spring of 2015 when the first animals left the Appalachian Mountains to try to make it back home.
